p: After the qualitative determination to remove the three aforementioned factors, leaving 15 factors (eight county, seven disease), we performed a quantitative analysis to compute the correlations between all remaining country parameters for the 198 countries in our dataset. As some of the country factors (see table 1) consist of ordinal level data, we used the Kendall correlation coefficient to compute the correlations. See figure 1 for the results between the eight country factors.
